section1.heading: 1. Platform Overview
section1.content: DreamChain is a decentralized platform where users can create fundraising campaigns (dreams) and donate to other users' campaigns using USDC stablecoin on the Base Sepolia blockchain.

section2.heading: 2. Platform Fee Structure
section2.intro: When a dream creator withdraws funds, DreamChain applies the following fee structure:

section3.heading: 3. Withdrawal Process
section3.content: Dream creators can withdraw their funds once the fundraising goal is reached. The withdrawal process deducts 19% platform fee from the total amount raised. Creators receive 81% of the total raised amount in their wallet.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subtitle: Learn about DreamChain and our mission

section1.heading: Our Mission
section1.content: DreamChain is on a mission to democratize dream-fulfillment by connecting dreamers with supporters worldwide. We believe every person deserves a chance to pursue their passion, and our platform makes it easier through blockchain technology and the power of community.

section2.heading: Our Vision
section2.content: We envision a world where geographical boundaries and traditional financial systems don't limit human potential. DreamChain aims to be the bridge between ambitious individuals and generous supporters, powered by transparent blockchain technology.

section3.heading: How It Works
items: Create a dream with a fundraising goal in USDC stablecoin
Share your dream with the community
Withdraw funds once your goal is reached (81% to creator, 19% platform fee)
Complete your dream and inspire others

section4.heading: Why Blockchain
section4.intro: We use blockchain technology for several key reasons:
items: Transparency: Every transaction is recorded and verifiable
Security: Smart contracts ensure funds are safe and properly distributed
Accessibility: Anyone with a wallet can participate from anywhere
Efficiency: Lower fees and faster settlements compared to traditional systems

section5.heading: Our Community
section5.content: DreamChain is powered by its community of dreamers and donors. Every dream shared, every donation made, and every goal reached strengthens our ecosystem. Together, we're creating a world where dreams aren't just wishes‚Äîthey're achievable goals supported by a global network.

section6.heading: Fair Fees
section6.content: We maintain a 19% platform fee to support infrastructure, development, and community initiatives. 81% of all donations go directly to dream creators, ensuring maximum impact.

privacyPage.subtitle: Learn how we protect your privacy

section1.heading: 1. Information Collection
section1.content: DreamChain collects minimal information necessary for platform operation. Main information includes your wallet address hash and transaction history.

section3.heading: 3. Data Security
section3.content: We use modern encryption methods to protect your data. However, no system is absolutely secure. We cannot guarantee complete protection from all security threats.

section4.heading: 4. Cookies
section4.content: DreamChain uses cookies to improve user experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may affect platform functionality.

section5.heading: 5. Third-Party Services
section5.content: DreamChain is not responsible for the privacy policies of third-party services, including wallets and blockchain networks. Please review their privacy policies separately.

section6.heading: 6. Contact
section6.content: If you have questions about our privacy policy, please contact us through the contact form on our website.
